dfischer.utils

Class StaticInputFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.StaticInputFile

  • public class StaticInputFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Thread safe access to input files whose lines can be shared by the simulated users.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void close(int fileID)
      Close a file.
      static int concurrentOpen(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String commentTag, java.lang.String delimiterChar, boolean trimValues, int eofAction)
      Deprecated. 
      since V5.4-K, does not support encrypted files. Open a new file in a thread safe way and return the file ID. The file is opened only once even when this method is called multiple times.
      static int concurrentOpen(SymmetricEncryptContext decryptContext, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String commentTag, java.lang.String delimiterChar, boolean trimValues, int eofAction)
      Open a new file in a thread safe way and return the file ID.
      static StaticInputFileLineContent getNextLine(int fileID)
      Get the next line from the file in a thread safe way and parse the values of this line.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Internal test program.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • concurrentOpen

        public static int concurrentOpen(SymmetricEncryptContext decryptContext,
                 java.lang.String filename,
                 java.lang.String commentTag,
                 java.lang.String delimiterChar,
                 boolean trimValues,
                 int eofAction)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Open a new file in a thread safe way and return the file ID. The file is opened only once even when this method is called multiple times.
        Parameters:
        decryptContext - the context to decrypt the file, or null if the file is not encrypted
        filename - name of the input file
        commentTag - line comment tag used to comment out lines, or a part within a line. All line chars behind the comment tag will not flow inside the parsed values of that line.
        delimiterChar - delimiter char to separate the values of each line. This string must contain one character only.
        trimValues - true = trim white spaces around values, false = don't trim
        eofAction - end of file Action: use EOF_REOPEN_FILE or EOF_STOP_READ
        Returns:
        the file ID
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        V5.4-K
        See Also:
        AbstractInputFileReader.EOF_REOPEN_FILE, AbstractInputFileReader.EOF_STOP_READ

      • concurrentOpen

        public static int concurrentOpen(java.lang.String filename,
                 java.lang.String commentTag,
                 java.lang.String delimiterChar,
                 boolean trimValues,
                 int eofAction)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. since V5.4-K, does not support encrypted files. Open a new file in a thread safe way and return the file ID. The file is opened only once even when this method is called multiple times.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the input file
        commentTag - line comment tag used to comment out lines, or a part within a line. All line chars behind the comment tag will not flow inside the parsed values of that line.
        delimiterChar - delimiter char to separate the values of each line. This string must contain one character only.
        trimValues - true = trim white spaces around values, false = don't trim
        eofAction - end of file Action: use EOF_REOPEN_FILE or EOF_STOP_READ
        Returns:
        the file ID
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        AbstractInputFileReader.EOF_REOPEN_FILE, AbstractInputFileReader.EOF_STOP_READ

      • close

        public static void close(int fileID)
        Close a file. Calling this method is optional and not thread safe.
        Parameters:
        fileID - the file ID

      • getNextLine

        public static StaticInputFileLineContent getNextLine(int fileID)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get the next line from the file in a thread safe way and parse the values of this line. This method skips automatically over empty or commented out lines.
        Parameters:
        fileID - the file ID
        Returns:
        the values of the line, or a flag about EOF.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Internal test program.
